desc: Buy online at Quintessentially English, one of the UK’s leading suppliers of handmade organic soaps & beauty products online. View all products now.

layout.text: Organic soaps handmade with love and care

We believe there’s a connection, between earth and air, fire and water – an energy that flows through everything: a quintessence. So when you use our soaps we hope the lovely essential oils will give you time to reconnect with the incredible infinite energy that surrounds us all.
